description: Presidential Secretariat - Appointed Hon. Abdul Haleem Mohamed Hasheem MP as the Minister of Muslim Religious Affairs & Posts w.e.f. 21.01.2015. Appointed Hon. Mohamed Thambi Hassan Ali MP as the Minister of Health w.e.f. 21.01.2015. Appointed Hon. Ranjan Ramanayake & 3 others as Deputy Ministers w.e.f. 21.01.2015. Appointed Mr. Sumith Abeysinghe as Secretary to the Cabinet of Ministers. Appointed Dr. R. H. S Samaratunghe & 2 others as Secretaries to the Ministers.
